CustomField.description: Countdown timer for BDR once first order is placed.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Account_Owner_Type__c,'BDR'), IF( !ISBLANK(Date_of_First_Order__c), TEXT(DATE(YEAR(Date_of_First_Order__c), MONTH(Date_of_First_Order__c)+2, DAY(Date_of_First_Order__c) ) - TODAY()), 'NA'), IF( ISPICKVAL(Account_Owner_Type__c,'AR'), IF( !ISBLANK(Date_of_First_Order__c), TEXT(DATE(YEAR(Date_of_First_Order__c)+1, MONTH(Date_of_First_Order__c)+2, DAY(Date_of_First_Order__c) ) - TODAY()), 'NA'), 'NA'))
CustomField.label: Countdown Timer(Days)
